üéá Visited Chofu Fireworks Festival 2025

On September 20, 2025, I attended the Chofu Fireworks Festival! Here’s my report on this popular fireworks festival in Tokyo, held at the Tamagawa Riverbank.

Beautiful moment at Chofu Fireworks Festival viewed from Tamagawa Riverbank

üìç Venue Information & Access

üöÉ Nearest Stations & Access

  • Keio Line Chofu Station 15-minute walk
  • Keio Line Nishi-Chofu Station 20-minute walk
  • JR Nambu Line Nishifu Station 25-minute walk

üéØ Viewing Areas

  • Tamagawa Riverbank: Free viewing area
  • Reserved Seating: Advance booking required (tatami & chair seats)
  • Recommended Spot: Central area of riverbank (facing fireworks)

‚è∞ Event Overview

Item Details
Date September 20, 2025 (Friday)
Time 18:30„Äú20:00
Number of Fireworks Approx. 8,000 shots
Attendance Approx. 300,000 people (estimated)
Weather Cloudy (perfect for fireworks viewing)

üéÜ Fireworks Highlights

üåü Chofu Fireworks Festival Features

  1. Music Fireworks: Beautiful performances synchronized with BGM
  2. Large Fireworks: Spectacular consecutive large-shell displays
  3. Great Access: Easy access from central Tokyo by train
  4. Riverbank Venue: Spacious area for relatively comfortable viewing

üì∏ Photography Points

  • Twilight: Contrast between sky gradation and fireworks
  • Building Silhouettes: Combination of Chofu cityscape and fireworks
  • Continuous Fireworks: Spectacular consecutive scenes synchronized with music

üç± Venue Food & Stalls

üèÆ Food Stall Information

  • Takoyaki: Classic fireworks festival food
  • Yakisoba: Fragrant sauce-flavored staple menu
  • Shaved Ice: Perfect for warm nights
  • Candy Apples: For sweet memories

üí° Recommended Items to Bring

  • Leisure Sheet: Essential for securing spots on riverbank
  • Drinks: Venue gets crowded, so prepare in advance
  • Light Snacks: If you want to avoid food stall crowds

üì± Useful Information & Tips

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notes

  • Crowds: Stations are extremely crowded after the event (30min-1hr wait)
  • Spot Saving: Good positions start filling up around 3:00 PM
  • Restrooms: Portable toilets are available, but go beforehand

üí° Recommended Points

  • Early Arrival: Arrive at 3:00-4:00 PM to secure good positions
  • Departure Timing: Start moving 5 minutes before end to avoid crowds
  • Rain Preparation: Check weather forecast (light rain, event continues)

üì∑ Photo Gallery

Selected particularly impressive moments from today’s photos:

Large fireworks blooming in the night sky. Beautiful contrast with Chofu cityscape

üìπ About the Videos: Shot 6 videos today, all uploaded to YouTube and embedded. Enjoy the charm of Chofu Fireworks Festival from opening to finale.

üåü Summary & Next Year’s Expectations

This Year’s Impressions

  • ‚úÖ Access: Easy participation within 1 hour from central Tokyo
  • ‚úÖ Scale: Impressive 8,000 fireworks display
  • ‚úÖ Music Performance: Excellent BGM synchronization
  • ‚úÖ Venue: Appealing open feeling of riverbank

Looking Forward to Next Year

  • Reserved Seating: Consider better viewing positions
  • Photography Equipment: Challenge with tripod for more beautiful photos
  • Gourmet: Explore restaurants around the venue

üîó Related Information

üìç Recommended Spots in Chofu Area

  • Chofu Tenjin-dori: Shopping street stroll
  • Jindaiji Temple: Historic temple and soba noodles
  • Jindai Botanical Garden: Enjoy seasonal flowers

üéÜ Other Fireworks Festival Information

  • Sumida River Fireworks Festival: Tokyo’s largest
  • Edogawa Fireworks Festival: Great access
  • Tachikawa Festival Showa Memorial Park Fireworks: Music collaboration

Shot on: September 20, 2025
Location: Chofu City, Tamagawa Riverbank
Equipment: Google Pixel (handheld shooting)

The Chofu Fireworks Festival beautifully colored this wonderful autumn night. Definitely an event I want to visit again next year!
